alert.note: Alert for Codington; Grant; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 12:40AM MDT until May 30 at 1:15AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Big Stone County in west central Minnesota... Southwestern Roberts County in northeastern South Dakota... Western Grant County in northeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Codington County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 140 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Shore, or 17 miles north of Watertown, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Marvin around 150 AM CDT. Summit around 155 AM CDT. Ortley around 200 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Rudebusch Corner, Peever, Finley Heights Housing, Peever Flats Housing and Agency Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
